name: Naples - Margherita Pizza
description: An Authentic Italian Naples Pizza Prepared with our signature pizza base & our classic house red pizza sauce with tomatoes, mozzarella, fresh basil & extra virgin olive oil.

name: Veggie Supreme
description: A supreme combination of Black Olives, Green Capsicum, Mushroom, Onion, spicy Red Paprika & juicy Sweet Corn with flavourful pan sauce and 100% mozzarella cheese.

name: Naples - Mixed Vegetables With Crumbled Feta Pizza
description: An Authentic Italian Naples Pizza Prepared with our signature pizza base & our classic house red pizza sauce with mozzarella grilled zucchini, mushroom, bell pepper, cherry tomato & crumbled feta.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Pizza topped with our herb-infused signature pan sauce and 100% mozzarella cheese. A classic treat for all cheese lovers out there!

name: Chicken Sausage
description: Pizza topped with Chicken n Cheese Sausages & crunchy Onions, flavourful pan sauce and 100% mozzarella cheese.

name: Spiced Paneer
description: Light & crispy new San Francisco Style Crust, topped with Chef's special sauce and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil.

name: Schezwan Corn & Capsicum
description: Personal Pizza topped with Spicy Schezwan sauce, sweet corn & crunchy capsicum and cheesy dressing

name: Mexican Fiesta
description: Flavourful mix of red capsicum, green capsicum, jalapeno, onion, black olives, sweet corn and 100% mozzarella Cheese with a signature spice sprinkle & our flavourful pan sauce.

name: Ultimate Tandoori Veggie
description: An ultimate combination of your favourite veggies- onion, green capsicum, mushroom, tomato, spicy jalapeno on tandoori sauce, topped with 100% mozzarella cheese & generous drizzle of mint mayo.

name: Sausage & Sweet Corn
description: Our classic chicken & cheese sausage, juicy sweet corn and 100% mozzarella cheese with flavourful pan sauce.

name: Dhabe Da Keema
description: Dhaba style chicken keema masala, with green chiili, crunchy onion with flavourful pan sauce, 100 % mozzarella cheese & a generous drizzle of mint mayo.

name: Sizzling Schezwan Chicken
description: Loaded with our signature spicy schezwan sauce, juicy schezwan chicken meatballs & 100% mozzarella cheese.

name: Nawabi Murg Makhni
description: A chicken lovers delight ! Combination of chicken malai tikka, flavourful chicken keema masala, crunchy onion, juicy tomato on our new makhni sauce with 100% mozzarella cheese and buttery spice sprinkle.

name: Cheezy Mushroom Magic
description: A new combination with creamy mushroom sauce, chunky black olives, spicy jalapeno, juicy sweet corn, mushroom and 100% mozzarella cheese with garlic sprinkle for extra flavour hit.

name: Country Feast
description: Loaded with Herbed Onion & Green capsicum, Sweet Corn, Tomato with signature pan sauce and 100% Mozzarella cheese. It's a feast you can't refuse.

name: Veg Maharaja Mac
description: Big Mac sesame seeds bun, with rich and crusty cheesy corn patty, topped with chunky vegetable-cocktail sauce served with pungent jalapeño slices, red onion slices, tomato slices, Cheddar cheese slice and crisp iceberg lettuce.

description: Best-seller combo of classic chicken zinger & tandoori zinger.

name: Veg Snacker

description: Jullienes of vegetables tossed with flour noodles in light soy sauce and chilli paste topped with burnt garlic.

name: Veg Hakka Noodles
description: Over 5 million sold till date!

name: Singapore Style Noodles
description: Jullienes of vegetables tossed with flour noodles in our in house sweet and tangy sauce garnished with spring onion.

name: Chicken Chilli Garlic Noodles
description: Jullienes of chicken tossed with flour noodles in light soy sauce and chilli paste topped with burnt garlic.

name: Peri Peri Chicken Wrap
description: Tender chicken breast, crisp mixed lettuce & tomato,pickled red onions, 2 slices of cheese, topped withNando's creamy Perinaise

name: Masala Paneer Tikka Wrap
description: We dont have any pun for paneer, but we do have a lot of surprises in this exciting snack that we roll into this wrap. Fresh paneer is smoked to perfection & drizzled with minty, spicy mayonnaise & wrapped in soft roti.

name: Cheese Melt Paneer Wrap
description: Let the good times roll with surprises & flavour with this exciting snack Cottage cheese is seasoned with select spices, slathered with creamy, gooey cheese & snuggly wrapped in soft roti.

name: Chicken Bhuna Wrap
description: The bestseller, rock n roll award goes to: Roasted and flavorful chicken pieces slow-cooked in spicy bhuna masala and wrapped with crisp onions in a freshly made roti. Is it snack time yet.

name: Cheesy Corn Salsa Wrap
description: Caution: Not your average snack! Mexican inspired corn salsa with a generous serving of cheese is wrapped in a soft roti. A combination oh-so unique with flavours on a roll

name: Veg Spring Roll
description: Spring Rolls are crunchy from outside, with a spiced veggie filling from inside.

name: Kurkure Paneer Spring Roll
description: It is fried, crispy, loaded, saucy and has indulgence written all over it.

name: Kurkure Spring Roll
description: A delectable spring roll stuffed with assorted veggies. Dipped in chatpata masala and coated with cornflakes, then fried and served hot. Served with tandoori and plain mayo on top.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Cottage cheese, greek yogurt, bell pepper, garam masala, mustard oil

name: Paneer 65
description: Paneer 65 is a spicy South Indian appetizer made with Paneer aka Indian cheese, flour, spices and herbs like curry leaves.

name: Veg Seekh Kebab
description: Matar, cabbage, beans, bread crumbs, garam masala powder

name: Chilli Paneer
description: Paneer, soy sauce, spring onion, green bell pepper, chilli sauce

name: Dahi Kabab
description: Greek yogurt, garam masala, gram flour, ginger, white pepper

name: Veg Manchurian
description: Apple cider vinegar, chili sauce, cabbage, bell peppers, bread crumbs

name: Honey Chilli Potato
description: Crispy Honey Chilli Potatoes are a super addictive snack - fried chilli potato fingers are tossed in a sesame honey chilli sauce that's sweet and spicy and will give you sticky fingers that you'll be licking clean!

name: Aloo Paratha
description: Whole wheat flour, paratha, potatoes, garam masala, mango pickle

name: Onion Paratha
description: Onion Paratha are delicious whole wheat flatbreads stuffed with piquant onions, spicy green chillies and savory spices.

name: Paneer Paratha
description: Paneer Paratha is an unleavened wheat flatbread stuffed with paneer aka Indian cottage cheese, spices and herbs.

name: Gobi Paratha
description: Also known as Cauliflower paratha, these unleavened whole wheat flatbreads are stuffed with a savory, spiced grated cauliflower filling.

name: Chicken Tikka
description: Small pieces of boneless chicken baked using skewers on a brazier called angeethi or over charcoal after marinating in Indian spices and dahi (yogurt)

name: Chicken Seekh Kebab
description: Ground chicken, garam masala, carrot, olive oil, lime juice

name: Egg Tikki Burger
description: An unusual burger stuffed with baked egg mixture.

name: Belgian Chocolate Milk Waffle
description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Melted Belgian Milk Chocolate. Simplicity At Its Best!

name: Chocolate Overload Dark Waffle
description: Signature Dark Chocolate Waffle + Melted Belgian Dark Chocolate. Double The Chocolate!

name: Triple Cookie
description: Original Red Velvet Waffle + A Divine Combination Of Biscoff, Oreo And KitKat Bits In Melted White Chocolate And Vanilla Ice Cream. A Must Try Symphony Of Flavours And Textures.

name: Death by Chocolate Waffle Cake
description: Signature dark chocolate single layer waffle cake layered with creamy White, Milk and Dark melted Belgian Chocolate. Triple the chocolate, triple the fun!

name: Blueberry Creamcheese Waffle
description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Blueberry Compote Layered With Philadelphia Style Cream Cheese.

name: Kiki & Oreo Cream Waffle
description: Signature Black Velvet Waffle + Our Special Blue Filling with Cookie Crunchy Oreo Bits Filling. Kiki Do You Love Me?

name: Red Velvet Waffle
description: Original Red Velvet Waffle + Philadelphia style cream cheese and melted Belgian white chocolate.

name: ALIVE BY CHOCOLATES Donut
description: Layers of chocolate with dark chocolate coating on a donut, bringing all your chocolate cravings to life!

name: Cookie Delight Donut
description: A perfect recipe to bring delight, adding chocolate cookies & colourful confetti to your donut!

name: Butterscotch Crumble Donut
description: Taste the distinctness of butterscotch with the abundance of crumbs spread wide over a rich chocolate donut!

name: Red Velvet Crunch Donut
description: https://everafterinthewoods.com/wp-content/uploads/how-to-make-red-velvet-donuts.jpg

name: RAINBOW POP Donut
description: Our soft donut, sprinkled with multi coloured sugar confetti! A rainbow for your sight!

name: Chocolate Frosted Donut
description: A Soft fluffy donut loaded with chocolate and a rich white chocolate icing on the top!

name: Black Forest Donut
description: A soft donut with tempting layers of chocolate decorated with whipped cream & cherry! An irrefutable affair!

name: Very Very Strawberry Donut
description: Strawberry Flavoured chocolate donut with an irresistible strawberry centre!

name: Kadai Chicken
description: Kadai Chicken (Chicken Karahi Curry) is a delicious Indian chicken curry where chicken is cooked with freshly ground spices.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Made from chicken with a spiced tomato and butter (makhan) sauce.

name: Dum Murgh Keema
description: When tender & juicy chicken is finely minced and slow-cooked with Behrouz's shahi masalas, you are bound to have a memorable daawat! Garnished with fresh coriander leaves, enjoy this shahi delicacy with your choice of bread.

name: Murgh Haleem Kebab
description: Crafted by Celebrity Chef Kunal Kapur slow-cooked haleem, a speciality of Mehfil-e-Ramadan is fused with Hyderabadi spices, rolled into elegant kebabs & char-grilled to perfection in ghee.

name: Murgh Makhani
description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in creamy butter chicken gravy, layered with aromatic basmati rice and dum pukht in its full glory. A royal fusion between two of Indias most beloved dishes.

name: Murgh Malai Kebab
description: Brimming with impeccable flavours this rich kebab delicacy is as delectable as it is charming. Succulent chicken pieces are eloquently spiced with royal spices and then grilled to perfection to lend it the fascinating smoky flavour.

name: Gosht-E-Galouti Kebab

name: Prawn Curry
description: Pounds large ​prawns, or tiger prawns ; large onions ; medium tomatoes ; green chiles ; tablespoons vegetable oil.

name: Chicken 65
description: Chicken 65 is a popular South Indian Chicken appetizer made by deep frying marinated chicken with curry leaves and green chilies.

name: Kadhai Chicken
description: Chicken prepared in spicy curry

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Marinated grilled chicken.

name: Chicken Rezala
description: Chicken Rezala is a creamy and rich Mughlai curry prepared with chicken, yogurt, cashews, poppy seeds, and a few whole spices.

name: Rogan Josh
description: Rogan Josh, a classic comfort food from the Kashmiri Cuisine is a slow cooked dish made with lamb, spices, herbs and yogurt.

name: Shalgam Gosht
description: Shalgam Gosht or Mutton Lamb Curry with Turnip is a deliciously spicy meat dish that is slow cooked to imbibe the flavor of spices.
